description: Section 73 application for the variation of condition 3 (plan numbers) in relation to planning permission P2015/0360/FUL dated 15/09/15 for 'Creation of new separate entrances to the community center and nursery. Ground and first floor side extensions and external alterations to the existing property.'  Amendments to include new entrance and canopy to be moved to the cafe entrance, Hocking Hall door to be replaced by a glazed door and the yard between cafe and Hocking Hall to be reconfigured.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 15/09/2018.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 15/09/2015 [LBI ref: P2015/0360/FUL.    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
